TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class CodeAccessPermission : System.Security.IPermission, System.Security.IStackWalk

.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CodeAccessPermission extends System.Object implements class System.Security.IPermission, class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.IStackWalk
Public MustInherit Class CodeAccessPermission Implements IPermission, IStackWalk
public ref class CodeAccessPermission abstract : System::Security::IPermission, System::Security::IStackWalk

summary.span: 定义所有代码访问权限的基础结构。

span.span: Defines the underlying structure of all code access permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码访问权限使用堆栈审核来确保代码的所有调用方已被授予权限。Code access permissions use a stack walk to ensure that all callers of the code have been granted a permission. 如果权限对象是`null`，对其进行处理的状态的权限对象相同。If a permission object is `null`, it is handled the same as a permission object with the state . 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，以便对调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 继承者类必须被授予完全信任才能正常工作作为安全基础结构扩展的权限。Inheritors of the class must be granted full trust to function correctly as permissions extending the security infrastructure. 若要确定完全受信任，继承者问题为 = `true`和 = `true`。To determine that the inheritors are fully trusted, issues an for = `true` and = `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生自的权限类。The following code example shows a permission derived from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CPP/nameidpermission.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CS/nameidpermission.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/VB/nameidpermission.vb#1)]

permission.span: 表示继承者提供证据以及查看和修改策略的能力。

span.span: for the ability of inheritors to provide evidence and view and modify policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数调用以初始化类型中的状态，每当创建派生类的实例。This constructor is called to initialize state in the type whenever an instance of the derived class is created. 尽管派生的类构造函数的构造函数声明中，您可以显式调用此构造函数，这通常没有必要;大多数编译器将自动生成对你的调用。Although you can explicitly call this constructor in the constructor declaration of the derived class constructor, this is not usually necessary; most compilers will automatically generate the call for you.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Assert() cil managed

summary.span: 声明调用代码能够通过调用此方法的代码，访问受权限请求保护的资源，即使未对堆栈中处于较高位置的调用方授予访问该资源的权限。

span.span: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

summary.span: 使用 会引起安全问题。

span.span: Using can create security issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，以便对调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 调用阻止源于较低的超出调用此方法的代码，在调用堆栈中向上继续执行调用堆栈进行堆栈审核。Calling prevents a stack walk originating lower in the call stack from proceeding up the call stack beyond the code that calls this method. 因此，即使调用堆栈上的高级调用方没有所需的权限来访问的资源，它们可以仍通过访问它的代码上所需的权限调用此方法。Therefore, even if callers higher on the call stack do not have the requisite permissions to access a resource, they can still access it through the code that calls this method on the necessary permission. 断言是仅当调用的代码的有效将传递它断言的权限的安全检查。An assertion is effective only if the code that calls passes the security check for the permission that it is asserting. 调用直到返回其调用方调用代码才生效。The call to is effective until the calling code returns to its caller. 只有一个可处于活动状态的帧。Only one can be active on a frame. 尝试调用时活动上中的帧结果存在。An attempt to call when an active exists on the frame results in a . 调用或删除活动。Call or to remove an active . 对于未授予对该权限的请求将不会成功的权限，将忽略。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed. 但是，如果调用堆栈上较低的代码调用对该权限堆栈审核达到尝试调用代码时，将引发。However, if code lower on the call stack calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 这是因为代码调用未被授予权限，即使它尝试它。This happens because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it tried to it. > [!CAUTION] > 因为调用中删除所有代码调用链中的要求必须授予访问指定的资源的权限，它可以打开个安全问题，如果使用不当。Because calling removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security issues if used incorrectly or inappropriately. 因此，它应谨慎使用。Therefore, it should be used with great caution.

exception.span: 调用代码没有 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限对象的副本与原始的权限对象的资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法。The following code example shows an override of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 如果未对调用堆栈中处于较高位置的所有调用方授予当前实例所指定的权限，则在运行时强制 。

span.span: Forces a at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permission specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全库通常使用此方法以确保调用方有权访问的资源。This method is typically used by secure libraries to ensure that callers have permission to access a resource. 例如，安全类库中的文件类调用为所需之前执行由调用方请求的文件操作。For example, a file class in a secure class library calls for the necessary before performing a file operation requested by the caller. 调用此方法的代码的权限不会检查;检查开始从该代码的直接调用方，并在堆栈中向上继续进行。The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，以便对调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 如果未成功引发。 succeeds only if no is raised.

exception.span: 调用堆栈中处于较高位置的调用方不具有当前实例所指定的权限。

span.span: A caller higher in the call stack does not have the permission specified by the current instance.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 调用堆栈中处于较高位置的调用方已经对当前权限对象调用了 。

span.span: A caller higher in the call stack has called on the current permission object.
You cannot override this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deny() cil managed

summary.span: 防止处于调用堆栈较高位置的调用函数使用可以调用此方法来访问当前实例指定资源的代码。

span.span: Prevents callers higher in the call stack from using the code that calls this method to access the resource specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法应仅用于防止意外的访问的资源完全受信任的代码。The method should be used only to protect resources from accidental access by fully trusted code. 它不应以防止故意误用资源受信任的代码。It should not be used to protect resources from intentional misuse by untrusted code. 例如，如果方法`A`问题权限，然后调用方法`B`，方法`B`而公开可以替代通过发出。For example, if method `A` issues a for a permission and then calls method `B`, method `B` can overtly override the by issuing an . 调用的方法是始终对堆栈中。The called method is always higher in the stack. 因此，如果方法`B`尝试访问受保护的资源，安全系统开始查找与它的权限，因为方法`B`是直接调用方，上下然后查找步程堆栈，以确认是否存在任何或堆栈中下方。Therefore, if method `B` tries to access a protected resource, the security system begins checking for permissions with it because method `B` is the immediate caller, and then walks down the stack to confirm that there is no or lower in the stack. 方法`B`，这尝试访问资源，可以停止堆栈审核立即使用方法。Method `B`, which is trying to access the resource, can stop the stack walk immediately by using the method. 在这种情况下，方法将位于堆栈上`A`永远不会发现 （调用方法）。In that case, the placed on the stack by method `A` (the calling method) is never discovered. 此方法会阻止调用堆栈中的高级调用方通过调用此方法的代码，访问受保护的资源，即使这些调用方已被授予权限来访问它。This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，以便对调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 可以限制了编程人员的责任或帮助防止出现意外的安全问题，因为它有助于防止调用的方法从用于访问被拒绝的权限所保护的资源。 can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security issues because it helps prevent the method that calls from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission. 如果一个方法调用对权限，并且如果到达时，该安全检查为该权限调用方的调用堆栈中较低级别调用，将会失败。If a method calls on a permission, and if a for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check will fail when it reaches the . 调用直到返回其调用方调用代码才生效。The call to is effective until the calling code returns to its caller. 只有一个可处于活动状态的帧。Only one can be active on a frame. 尝试调用时活动上中的帧结果存在。An attempt to call when an active exists on the frame results in a . 调用或删除活动。Call or to remove an active . 对于未授予对该权限的请求将不会成功的权限，将忽略。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能会有所不同，因此不应使用的哈希代码来比较两个对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法。The following code example shows an override of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public MustOverride Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 由派生类实现时，确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含在指定权限的操作，当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 以下语句都需要`true`的所有重写方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all overrides of the method. *X*， *Y*，和*Z*表示不是空引用的自定义代码访问权限对象*U*表示不受限制的代码的访问权限，和*N*表示具有空权限的。*X*, *Y*, and *Z* represent custom code access permission objects that are not null references, *U* represents an unrestricted code access permission, and *N* represents an empty permission with a of . - *X*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 返回`true`。*X*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) returns `true`. - *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 返回相同的值*Y*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 当且仅当*X*和*Y*表示相同的权限集。*X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) returns the same value as *Y*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) if and only if *X* and *Y* represent the same set of permissions. - 如果*X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 和*Y*。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 两者都返回`true`， *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 返回`true`。If *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) and *Y*.IsSubsetOf(*Z*) both return `true`, *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Z*) returns `true`. - *X*。IsSubsetOf (*U*) 返回`true`。*X*.IsSubsetOf(*U*) returns `true`. - *X*。IsSubsetOf (*N*) 返回`false`。*X*.IsSubsetOf(*N*) returns `false`. - *N*。IsSubsetOf (*X*) 返回`true`。*N*.IsSubsetOf(*X*) returns `true`. 如果*X*和*Y*表示自定义代码访问权限对象是空引用， *X*。IsSubsetOf (*Y*) 返回`true`。If *X* and *Y* represent custom code access permission objects that are null references, *X*.IsSubsetOf(*Y*) returns `true`. 如果*Z*也为 null，则复合集运算*X*。联合 (*Y*)。IsSubsetOf (*Z*) 也会返回`true`因为两个 null 权限的联合是 null 的权限。If *Z* is also null, the compound set operation *X*.Union(*Y*).IsSubsetOf(*Z*) also returns `true` because the union of two null permissions is a null permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法。The following code example shows an override of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CPP/nameidpermission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CS/nameidpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/VB/nameidpermission.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PermitOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 防止处于调用堆栈较高位置的调用函数使用此代码，此代码将调用此方法来访问除当前实例指定的资源以外的所有资源。

span.span: Prevents callers higher in the call stack from using the code that calls this method to access all resources except for the resource specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法应仅用于防止意外的访问的资源完全受信任的代码。The method should be used only to protect resources from accidental access by fully trusted code. 它不应以防止故意误用资源受信任的代码。It should not be used to protect resources from intentional misuse by untrusted code. 例如，如果方法`A`问题权限，然后调用方法`B`，方法`B`而公开可以替代通过发出。For example, if method `A` issues a for a permission and then calls method `B`, method `B` can overtly override the by issuing an . 调用的方法是始终对堆栈中。The called method is always higher in the stack. 因此，如果方法`B`尝试访问受保护的资源，安全系统开始查找与它的权限，因为方法`B`是直接调用方，上下然后查找步程堆栈，以确认是否存在任何或堆栈中下方。Therefore, if method `B` tries to access a protected resource, the security system begins checking for permissions with it because method `B` is the immediate caller, and then walks down the stack to confirm that there is no or lower in the stack. 方法`B`，这尝试访问资源，可以停止堆栈审核立即使用方法。Method `B`, which is trying to access the resource, can stop the stack walk immediately by using the method. 在这种情况下，方法将位于堆栈上`A`永远不会发现 （调用方法）。In that case, the placed on the stack by method `A` (the calling method) is never discovered. 类似于，因为同时导致堆栈审核失败时它们原本应该成功。 is similar to , in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed. 差异在于指定权限将导致堆栈审核失败，但指定不会导致堆栈审核失败的唯一权限。The difference is that specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail. 调用此方法，以确保你的代码可以用于访问指定的资源。Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources. 调用直到返回其调用方调用代码才生效。The call to is effective until the calling code returns to its caller. 只有一个可处于活动状态的帧。Only one can be active on a frame. 尝试调用时活动上中的帧结果存在。An attempt to call when an active exists on the frame results in a . 调用或删除活动。Call or to remove an active . 对于未授予对该权限的请求将不会成功的权限，将忽略。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission will not succeed. 但是，如果在调用的低级代码堆栈更高版本调用对该权限堆栈审核达到尝试调用代码时，将引发。However, if code lower on the call stack later calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 这是因为代码调用未被授予权限，即使它调用对该权限。This is because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it called for that permission. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，以便对调用堆栈中调用方法中较低的调用堆栈。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.

exception.span: 已存在一个用于当前帧的活动的 。

span.span: There is already an active for the current frame.
You cannot override this method.

summary.span: 导致当前帧以前所有的重写被删除且不再有效。

span.span: Causes all previous overrides for the current frame to be removed and no longer in effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有重写 (， ，或) 当前帧，引发。If there are no overrides (, , or ) for the current frame, an is thrown.

exception.span: 当前框架没有上一个 、 和 。

span.span: There is no previous , , or for the current frame.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the current permission object.

returns.span: 当前权限对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可在调试时需要显示为字符串的权限。This method is useful in debugging when you need to display the permission as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ToXml () As SecurityElement

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.

returns.span: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

span.span: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展安全对象的自定义代码需要实现和方法来使对象安全性进行编码。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the and methods to make the objects security-encodable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法。The following code example shows an override of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CPP/nameidpermission.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/CS/nameidpermission.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.NameIdPermission/VB/nameidpermission.vb#11)]

para.span: 你必须重写此方法在派生类。

span.span: You must override this method in a derived class.

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，则创建属于当前权限与指定权限的并集的权限。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法。The following code example shows an override of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
